taskbody.prereq: Local field definition are already imported from T24 environment and contains local fields definition you need. You already have created a domain model of type Local Reference in application that is open in the editor.
taskbody.context: This task describes how to create a class grouping local fields that can be used for extending application with multi-value fields.

cmd.xref: Add a class to your domain.

step.cmd: Set a name to the properties view. You are free to choose any name for the class.

cmd.xref: Add an attribute to your class.

step.stepresult: A dialog box lists all existing local fields definition.

step.cmd: Select the local field definition from the list.
Add all fields you need to group together in that class.

taskbody.result: The class is ready for being referenced from a class extending application.
